content: Credit Card Asked by AnonymousAsked on 30 Jun 2019Which credit card would be suitable if I were to apply for it just for emergency use?I would like to get a credit card, which is a good credit card for someone who is in their 20s and just want to use for emergency purposes?1 answerAnswerBump0

SShieleenLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 01 Jul 2019What is consider as your emergency?Depends on your needs, but if you don’t use it often or meet the criteria, you won’t reap the benefits of the card. Tons of comparison website out there, for example https://www.gobear.com/sg.0 comments0
